alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Morris; Somerset; Sussex; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 3:26PM EST until January 13 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and northwest New Jersey and east central, northeast and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast winds will increase this evening. Extremely saturated soils due to previous rainfall events may result in trees and power poles being more more susceptible to wind. There will be a lull in the winds early Saturday morning before shifting to the west and increasing again with gusts near 40 to 50 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Hunterdon; Mercer; Middlesex; Morris; Somerset; Sussex; Warren
